titleStmt.title: The answers and case of Francis VVyvill and Ann his VVife, to the petition and appeal of Dorothy Hewley, Exhibited by or on her behalf against them, to the right honourable the Lords Spiritual and Temporal in Parliament assembled.
titleStmt.author: Hewley, Dorothy.
Wyvill, Francis.
Wyvill, Anne.
